response.original_title: Efímero, el oído de la memoria
response.overview: This is a miniseries in which each chapter features a unique musical ensemble. The material aims to transcend the spectator's position and approach the artists' experience on stage, guided by professional musicians behind the cameras. It is a visual result committed to sound and its multiple meanings. Music is presented as another way of experiencing memory, leaving the viewer to create their own unique and personal reconstruction that completes the experience. Six short musical stories connect to compose one of the many cultural puzzles of South America. Chapters 1, "La Mufa," and 2, "Sara Sabah," will be screened.
response.title: Efímero, el oído de la memoria
